downloads_protocols.desc: Number of protocols used to download packages
downloads_protocols.name: Protocols

its_allhistory_participants.desc: Number of participants in all history in the ticketing system
its_allhistory_participants.name: All Participants

its_changed.desc: Number of changes to the state of tickets
its_changed.name: Tickets changed

its_changers.desc: Number of persons changing the state of tickets
its_changers.name: Tickets changers

its_companies.desc: Number of organizations (companies, etc.) with persons active in the ticketing system
its_companies.name: Organizations

its_countries.desc: Number of countries with persons active in the ticketing system
its_countries.name: Countries

its_domains.desc: Number of distinct email domains with persons active in the ticketing system
its_domains.name: Domains

its_openers.desc: Number of persons submitting new tickets
its_openers.name: Ticket submitters

its_projects.desc: Number of distinct projects active in the ticketing system
its_projects.name: Projects

mls_domains.desc: Domains found in the analysis of mailing lists
mls_domains.name: Domains

mls_sent_init.desc: Emails sent to start a thread
mls_sent_init.name: EmailsSentInit

scm_actions.desc: Actions performed on several files (add, remove, copy, ... each file)
scm_actions.name: Actions

scm_authors.desc: People authoring commits (changes to source code)
scm_authors.name: Authors

scm_avg_authors_period.desc: Average number of authors per period
scm_avg_authors_period.name: Average Authors per period

scm_avg_commits.desc: Average number of commits per period
scm_avg_commits.name: Average Commits per period

scm_avg_commits_author.desc: Average number of commits per author
scm_avg_commits_author.name: Average Commits per Author

scm_avg_committers_period.desc: Average number of committers per period
scm_avg_committers_period.name: Average Committers per period

scm_avg_files.desc: Average number of files per period
scm_avg_files.name: Average Files per period

scm_avg_files_author.desc: Average number of files per author
scm_avg_files_author.name: Average Files per Author

scm_committers.desc: Number of developers committing (merging changes to source code)
scm_committers.name: Committers

scm_companies.desc: Companies participating in the source code management system
scm_companies.name: Companies

scm_countries.desc: Countries participating in the source code management system
scm_countries.name: Countries

scm_domains.desc: Domains participating in the source code management system
scm_domains.name: Domains

scm_files.desc: Number of files 'touched' (added, modified, removed, ) by at least one commit
scm_files.name: Files

scm_lines.desc: Number of added and/or removed lines
scm_lines.name: Lines

scm_repositories.desc: Number of repositories in the source code management system
scm_repositories.name: Repositories
